arts.ttl: Bournemouth vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Bournemouth welcome Newcastle to the Vitality Stadium on Sunday in superb form, riding a three-match winning streak that has lifted them into the Premier League’s top four. Andoni Iraola’s side is full of confidence and will be aiming to win a fourth successive top-flight game for the first time since 2018. The Cherries are also […] The post Bournemouth vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United XI vs Bournemouth – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Eddie Howe takes his Newcastle United side to the south coast on Sunday to face a formidable Bournemouth team. The Magpies must quickly overcome the physical and mental toll of a draining midweek Champions League defeat to Barcelona as they prepare to take on one of the Premier League‘s most in-form teams. arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola indicates the strength of his midfield through a selection ‘headache’ for Newcastle
arts.sum: Bafode is also training well - I wouldn't say he is 100% but I would expect him to also be available." The midfield unit is a big strength for Newcastle United, but with a week of rest and a strong roster, Bournemouth are giving the "best headaches" to Andoni Iraola as to how he handles this challenge.

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola insists Newcastle United ‘deserve more points’ from performances this season
arts.sum: Andoni Iraola is sure his eyes do not deceive him about Newcastle United, feeling that the Toon "deserve more points" this year. They added big quality players to a very good team and we will have to be ready.”
